title: The After Show Discusses Consumer Behavior During the Pandemic
itunes:title: The After Show Discusses Consumer Behavior During the Pandemic
description:
This week, the crew discusses consumer buying behavior during the pandemic. Are people buying more, fewer or different cigars? Will their behavior change

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
